name: Antergos Live Install Media
description: The Live Install Image allows you to try a fully functional Antergos environment without making any changes to the current state of your system. When you are ready, you can create a permanent place for Antergos on your system using our GUI installer.
A fully functional GNOME Desktop Environment that runs directly from a USB drive and includes our GUI installer.
Test drive Antergos without making any changes to your system.

name: Antergos Minimal Install Media
description: The Minimal Install Image includes only our GUI installer.
Smaller file size saves bandwidth and improves initial download time.
Best option for running the installer on less powerful hardware.
